website_summaries.verdict: A combination of 16 lightbulbs organically arranged to create a sense of natural art. Best used in a larger space that can accommodate the full volume of the light.
pros: Design provides a unique look in a large space
The included bulbs are energy efficient and produce a warm color in the room
cons: Chandelier branches make it difficult to replace a broken light bulb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Light
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light. I have used for a few years now, and I am still as happy as the day it arrived. I constantly get compliments and have had no issues. It did take a while to unbend all the branches, but I and happy there were so many, as it makes for an amazingly beautiful chandelier
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait and price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the light took awhile to install every branch and spread them open but was well worth it in the end. Very bright and just wish I didn’t put it on a dimmer switch. Well worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It's not warm white.. :-/
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice chandelier. Easy to assemble, but heavy to install. I changed the wiring to a 20' cord and plug in, and wire cable to hang on a hook. Also put it on a smart dimmer switch. My problem with it is, the description said warm white LED bulbs.. that's not warm white.
customer_reviews.author: S. Westfall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not as bright.
customer_reviews.text: First off the chandelier is barnun one of the most beautiful I have ever seen. However I had to give it 3 stars because its not as bright as it should be. Thereby its not serving the purpose. I am using in a dressing room I just built and it looks dark in here in the daytime. Please let me know if I can get brighter bulbs. Its paramount!
customer_reviews.author: 24HR Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good quality considering the price. Bulbs are about 6k in color temp, so very bright white. Lower temp bulbs are easily found. Install was very straight forward. Put the top fonds on, hang half way, put the bottom fonds on, finish hanging. That’s it.
customer_reviews.author: James Kahan

customer_reviews.title: Most beautiful lamp ever!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is gorgeous!! Looks spectacular! It was a little difficult to install because it was a very high ceiling but my husband amd father in law did it. Is very bright..i.got the daylight bulbs thanks God! You wont regret getting this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: LNV

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Excellent customer service bonus.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the “medium” but once installed my tall ceilings swallowed it up so ordered the large. Which arrived with a broken ring (important for install). These folks were very gracious and negotiated with me. I ended up mixing parts from each fixture and returning what I didn’t use. Additionally, we negotiated a partial refund. End result! My light is a HIT. Very satisfied customer here. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We had to buy a better bracket to better hold up this very heavy light, It was pretty scary to install, but it looks great and I really love it. We bought the 31.5 inch for the foyer and two smaller 19 inch lights.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Carr

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace the mounting hardware and the branches are a pain in the @ss to install and spread. But it looks great once you’re finished.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: BeUtiful
customer_reviews.text: THIS CHANDELIER IS SO BEAUTIFUL IN MY DINING ROOM. I JUST AT IT WITH THE LIGHTS ON AAND OFF. I HAVE SHARED ON FACEBOOK AND PEOPLE LOVED IT.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Carolyn E. Vanbramer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful center light fixture.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. Wonderful light. Install not nearly as hard as somehave suggested. We are on the 17th floor and the light sparkles from below.
customer_reviews.author: NPC-1953

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chandelier. It is beautiful. Install took 10 minutes-the assembly took 40. However it is completely worth it. I would recommend a dimmer!
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Fixture
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous. All that I thought it would be and more!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ... needed it and to put it together but looks great once done
customer_reviews.text: Was a lot of work to get it where i needed it and to put it together but looks great once done.
customer_reviews.author: Mystical-East Fragarance

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks so beautiful! Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: IK

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something other than a chandelier and I got it!
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: It’s bright
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but lots of rods to screw in and then fluff
customer_reviews.author: Boatman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This light is Amazing. Everyone who enters my home ask about it!!
customer_reviews.author: DW Howard jr

customer_reviews.title: They look amazing in my restaurant
customer_reviews.text: I am so thrilled!!!! They look amazing in my restaurant!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Fixter

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy, albeit tedious, to assemble—especially if you are a perfectionist like me. It was an absolute nightmare to install for my husband, who is more than moderately handy (with me acting as assistant). It took forever, and the instructions may as well not have been included because we had to come up with our own custom install to make it all fit. However, with all that being considered, this fixture is absolutely beautiful, and I love it! Perfect chandelier for the dining room in our new home. I even ordered another one for the living room... Sheesh. My husband must really love me to do this again. Maybe we will call a professional for this next one.
customer_reviews.author: Mariposa

customer_reviews.title: Order a crossbar or buy one at the big box store before installing.
customer_reviews.text: Great fixture and fun to install. Your guests will love it! We put it in the kitchen bistro area and it looks great. You will want to order or buy a crossbar at home depot. I have installed two of these, and the part that comes with it is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Light for Entrance to home.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely light. Put it in the entrance of my home. Takes a few minute to assemble and you will need to adjust the limbs after it is hung. Also make sure you get the length right the first go round. You don’t want to have to take it down and rehang.
customer_reviews.author: Karlie B

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light for my enterance way. It was a bit too bright with the 8 bulbs, so I removed some of the bulbs and it's perfect lighting now. It wasn't hard to install either, standard 3-wire install. It came with two extra bulbs too! It's working perfect for us. The light produces a very bright, white light; however, the picture shows it as yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice
customer_reviews.text: I received on time and with the parts complete and no damage at all, it came with all the light bulbs and two extra for spare parts.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo M.

customer_reviews.title: Very unusual and beautiful lamp.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is very beautiful and unusual, it look like a sun. Tou can persnalize it shaping bending a little the "beams". Excellent choice to place it under our skylight. I wish they were more specific answer about "dimmable or not/ with a led dimmer. And the color of the bulb is a little grayish or bluish for me, so I will change them (not easy to find G4 10v 45 2000 kevin bulbs)... But otherwise, we are very happy with this beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.author: Marie-Helene and Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but two different bulb colors; frustrating.
customer_reviews.text: Chandelier is very pretty, however, after installing, half of the bulbs included were warm white and half were bright white. So, half of the bulbs look crisp and the other half look sick. Might be hard to see in Iphone pic but very obvious in real life. The boxes the bulbs come in have check boxes for 6500k and 3300k but neither is checked. Just totally random. Hey seller: Can you make this right?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Put some sparkle in your life!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fun and glitzy chandelier for my new bathroom and discovered this online! I am absolutely thrilled with it. Easy to assemble and the sparkly sprigs can be bent and arranged how you want them. It is fun and sparkly.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Annie

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, time consuming to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these to go into a waiting area for my business. It was a little daunting to get them together & one was missing a mounting board but the seller got the parts to me right away. They are so pretty. I can see why some reviews say they are yellow & some reviews say they are white. I have 3 that are white & one that is yellow. I have another message to the seller asking if I can get all white bulbs. Just a little hassle but so worth the price and they are stunning.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Not UL rated
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning this. It's looks very pretty but, this light base says it's 50hz. US standard is 60. It is not UL rated. I think it may be unsafe to install this in my home. Made in China
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing!! It is a little difficult to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing!! It is a little difficult to fit in the ceiling but my husband figured it out. And it is dimmable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Difficult installation but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these, my husband, who is very handy, put up one. He complained the entire time, but in the end it was worth it. I am obsessed with this light, it is beautiful. Unfortunately the second one is missing all the hardware 😔. That is the reason for only 4 stars, my husband on the other hand would only give it 2 due to the difficulty of installation. I would suggest not screw-in all the crystals until after installing the light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read
customer_reviews.text: If you decide to get crazy bay this lamps Hard installation no compatible very well whit American standard Scrub shorts to install I bought 12 and i guarantee it take one hour and 30 minutes to install Looks nice after that
customer_reviews.author: Giancarlo Scalzotto

customer_reviews.title: Check the finish
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chandelier. I was so disappointed when we got it because the color was chrome (shiny) rather than the stainless color than was advertised. I chatted with someone hoping we had just received the wrong box & shipped a second. Unfortunately the second one was still shining. I am so disappointed because I absolutely love the chandelier but it doesn’t match our decor.
customer_reviews.author: MomTeacherMom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is different My wife liked this light Fixture I didn't I thought I would not like this light but when I set it up and turned it on I fell for it I like it now and recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Milton

customer_reviews.title: Such a great piece. Adds a spark of feminine elegance to ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a great piece. Adds a spark of feminine elegance to the room. We have it in the bedroom. Not the best source of light so don’t count on it for that. The light is LED w a blueish hue. The electrician didn’t have much difficulty installing it. Was done in about 15-20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. It was not the easiest to install or assemble. The price was fair and once the light is installed, it's beautiful. It came with all the bulbs and two extra.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Disbro

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT IS PICTURED!
customer_reviews.text: The light I got IS NOT the light that is pictured! Someone else has also posted this issue here in the reviews. I got the same light as him (with large silver discs that look like extra large sequins). I’m super disappointed and now need to find something else :-(
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Beauty, value, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This light is gorgeous. You dont get the try beauty of this light until it's up and lit. Diamond in the rough kind of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Really cheap plastic appearance and hard to assemble. Would have preferred a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Crafts

customer_reviews.title: Unusual design does not fit into all surroundings
customer_reviews.text: Style did not meet our expectations nor combine well with surroundings. You have to be able to “design” this piece into your interior design. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Its hanging above spiral stairs. Get it, spread it out like a Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Smick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Unique
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. Bought dimmable bulbs for it with a smart dimmer and I’m having trouble getting it to work. I’ll call an electrician to get them to install it. But otherwise it’s a statement piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer  Ensley

customer_reviews.title: Nice fireworks light!
customer_reviews.text: Very striking and beautiful light that is definitely a conversation starter! Looks great and the shadow light is so pretty. I put this in my upstairs hallway over the stairs. It looks good with the lights dimmed too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect finishing Touch
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this light. It was a little time consuming to put together but not hard
customer_reviews.author: S. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Fun light...everyone comments on it. Put a dimmer switch on it and you have many different looks.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Farquhar

customer_reviews.title: I walk by it.... and I smile
customer_reviews.text: It’s better than I expected! Easy to install and assemble. My husband and I did it together. Didn’t cuss one time!!! Lol. It’s absolutely beautiful. It’s edgy but elegant. I walk by it ...and I smile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful accent!
customer_reviews.text: My honey had a little bit of a hard time installing - and he’s a carpenter so you may want to have installed for you - but putting together was easy and it looks lovely in the nursery!
customer_reviews.author: Jag8rJess

customer_reviews.title: Great light, horrible assembly directios
customer_reviews.text: Great light, horrible directions! I love this light, as does my wife, but the directions are quite poor. I ended up using different hardware to install the light on my existing fixture box.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous statement piece
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous and a show stopper. Grabs the attention of everyone when it’s on . Screwing in the crystal ball pieces take some time but definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Simply beautiful! I am so in love with to his light! I hung it over my tub in my master bath and it was just what I wanted. The jewelry to my bathroom design!
customer_reviews.author: FELECIA SEARD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing and we get lots of compliments on it. We did have to buy parts to make it fit(as other reviewers stated) My only real complaint would be that it’s not as bright as I would like it to be but the beauty makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: Pictures make it look much better than it does in real life. The lights are bright and the chandelier itself looks extremely cheap. I was embarrassed to have it up. I passed the return window so this was a waste. I’ll be replacing it with another chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It is assembly required
customer_reviews.text: It came in a small box ready to install and put together when the ceiling area is ready
customer_reviews.author: lisa gentry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful light. But be prepared the bulbs are illuminated at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never order anything that comes from China!
customer_reviews.text: This is not at all as described... due to illness could not get it returned on time. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne LaFavor

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a very expensive chandelier when it is set up and hung. Perfect for the bathroom. Can't beat the price. Gives off a good amount of light also. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I can’t return these or I would . The install instructions were impossible to understand and my electrician even said the same. I purchased two of these and we can’t even use them. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Marla Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The advertising and description was accurate. I love the way it changed the look of the space versus my previous chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large foyer and used one on each side. I couldn’t be happier with the look of the little Chrystal’s they light up like dewdrops! Very easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great light for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of it. The bulbs are a little bright, but over all I love i
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: Worth the time spent on assembling and installing. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the time to assemble the pieces. We had a hard time installing it, but the final product is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap I won’t even put it up in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beauty light
customer_reviews.text: Very classy looking. Light wt. and nice amount of light! Would buy more. I get slot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Jackamis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! It took time to put together all the stems but it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, need experience to put up
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good and I’m happy with the way it looks it took a little bit of effort to put up, but it is up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty - but not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size and I like the ceiling bracket better on the one I received than the one in the photo. That being said, what I have is not what I ordered. The one I received has silver metal discs in addition to the crystal beads. It cheapens the look of the chandelier. It was such a pain to unbox and install that by the time I pulled out the “fireworks” to attach them, it wasn’t worth taking the whole thing down.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: In Love
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is absolutely gorgeous!! Installation was a little difficult due to issues of the box it was being connected to in my home nothing to do with the light itself, but the hassle was so worth it. Screwing the pieces in was a bit tedious, but I did order the 31.5" light so there were a lot of pieces, I think about 40 😩. But once again it was so worth it! I received the bright white light bulbs. I originally didn't want the bulbs that bright, but I figured I'd try something dimmer once these bulbs go. I have been getting compliments since installing and the my dining room isn't even complete yet. Or maybe it is lol
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, not the process.
customer_reviews.text: After four hours we finally got this installed in our bathroom. My husband works in the lighting/electric industry and had to go back to his store and get additional parts to make it work but we did make it work! It didn’t come with instructions and the bolts were scattered inside the box (not packaged well at all) but after finally getting it installed, I love it. Wish it were brighter and the cords were longer but we will figure that out later.
customer_reviews.author: Anywherebutarizona

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare Setup!
customer_reviews.text: The light fixture does NOT fit with standard US brackets and was a nightmare to try and set up 2 stories high. We tried ordering a different bracket and that still didn’t work. We finally decided that we would just return the light and by then it was too late (30 days) and Amazon no longer would accept the return. I’m very upset to be out $180 and still having no light!
customer_reviews.author: Pen name

customer_reviews.title: 💕💕💕love my chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this chandelier! Puts off great light and their white bulbs are perfect!💕💕💕 assembly was easy just took a bit to screw all of the pieces in place.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

product_meta.title: GDNS Contemporary Firework Crystal Chandeliers,Pendant Lighting,Ceiling Lights Fixtures for Living Room Bedroom Restaurant Porch
product_meta.description:
Size:Dia:23.5 inSpecifications:
Type: Chandelier
Voltage: 110V 
Body Material: Painted iron and K9 crystal
Style: Modern 
Product Dimensions:Dia 23.5 inches,the steel sling length:47 inch(can adjust 0-47inch yourself).
Is Bub Included: Yes
Suggest space size:5-8Sq.m.
Space Application:This chandelier is suitable for the kitchen,dining room,barn,living room, porch,entryway,foyer use,but this is just a suggestion, you can according to your actual needs to choose where is installed in.

Features:
Loft style elegant home decoration
contemporary design, best product for pursuit of your personality
Notice:

If you want to replace the bulbs ,please choose G4 110V bulb.Do not use 12V bulbs!Thanks!
feature_bullets: Modern and elegant design for home accessories.Recommend to decor your Living Room,Bedroom,Dining Room,Kitchen,Bathroom,Foyer,Hallway,Office, Girls room, Kids Room Etc.
Product Dimension:Dia:23.5 inches,the length of steel sling:47 inch(can adjust 0-59 inches as your needed)
Bulb Included:8 pcs G4 LED bulbs(5W / pcs,can replace ),MAX 40W, Voltage:110V

Notice:If you want to replace the bulbs ,please choose G4 110V bulb.Do not use 12V bulbs,or it will blew up.100% Satisfaction Guarantee: 36-Month Warranty on parts. 24/7 customer support with technical advice.
